actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize an increase in funds for land acquisition at Colonial National Historical Park, in the State of Virginia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes an increase in funds, from $2,277,000 to $9,737,000, for land acquisition at Colonial National Historical Park, in the State of Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an increase in funds for land acquisition at Colonial National Historical Park, in the State of Virginia, and for other purposes.
